ew-extension.name: TinyMCE
ew-extension.author: e.World
ew-extension.description:
Use TinyMCE as DHTML Editor. Developer Website: http://tinymce.moxiecode.com/index.php TinyMCE is distributed under the LGPL Open Source license.
Note: TinyMCE requires IE >= 9.
Note: TinyMCE is not part of PHPMaker. Please read "Third-Party Tools" in the help file.
